source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: How To Make Free-form Resin Geodes and Agate Slices
items.headline: Learn how to make solid resin sculptures and artworks that resemble nature with crystals, glass and glitters
objectives_summary: Two ways to make a mold for your resin
How to work with resin safely and the basic supplies and tools you will need
How to build up layers of resin to give your piece depth

items.title: Drawing Birds: The Essential Guide
items.headline: Learn how to draw birds like an expert - quickly, easily and pain free
objectives_summary: Understand the fundamental elements of bird anatomy - including their feet, their wings and their skeletons
Draw a wide variety of bird species - from owls to ducks to penguins
Render bird drawings with realistic, life-like feathers

items.title: How To Solve Painting Problems
items.headline: Solve These Important Painting Problems. Paint with confidence and see your paintings improve massively. (Updated 2016)
objectives_summary: plan, prepare and complete landscape paintings
use essential painting techniques
approach various landscape subjects with confidence

items.title: An Introduction to the Art of Book Binding
items.headline: Learn binding techniques for journals, sketchbooks, zines, artist's books, scrap books, and more!
objectives_summary: Students will have a general understanding of book making with an exposure to:
Terms, Materials, and Resources
Binding Techniques

items.title: Colored Pencil Character Drawing Secrets with Cindy Wider

visible_instructors.title: Cindy Wider
visible_instructors.job_title: Art Educator, Artist and Co-Founder of DrawPj.com
visible_instructors.name: Cindy

items.headline: Learn Professional Colored Pencil Drawing Techniques Suitable for Children's Characters, Coloring Books and Illustration
objectives_summary: My special 'one pencil tip - three ways' technique (this will save you time and money!)
Confidently prepare and use your colored pencils for professional looking results
Create a fully rendered drawing of a children's picture book character

items.title: Mastering Still Life Painting in Oils or Acrylics
items.headline: Popular teacher Richard Robinson takes you from the basics onwards
objectives_summary: Progress from the basics and enjoy painting still life with confidence!
Learn an easy palette setup for still life painting.
Learn how to setup a still life and light it beautifully.

items.title: Classical Drawing
items.headline: Drawing Fundamentals
objectives_summary: Full Curriculum Dedicated to Classical Drawing Techniques and Fundamentals.
Sphere Drawing (Chiaroscuro or Light and Shade Theory).
Still Life Drawing (Construction of Ovoidal and Overlapping Forms).

items.title: The Oil Painting Process

visible_instructors.title: Jill Poyerd
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist and Fine Arts Educator
visible_instructors.name: Jill

items.headline: A comprehensive, simplified look at how to build an oil painting, from substructure to varnish.
objectives_summary: How to create a stable, long-lasting oil painting.
The various support options plus their pros and cons.
Why sizing is necessary and how to apply it.

items.title: Watercolor for Beginners
items.headline: A Crash Course in Watercolor - With a Modern Twist
objectives_summary: This course lays out the most valuable information that you need to start watercolor. Learn the few essential materials you need, how to mix the paint with water and how to mix colors together to create a rich palette. Understand how to control the paint by learning 6 fundamental washes. Quickly gain confidence with your brush by understanding how to apply pressure and paint with precision. See the beauty of watercolor's transparent quality by painting with layers. And the best part, this class applies the techniques you’ve learned to create 4 frame-worthy paintings.

items.title: Alcohol Ink Abstract Play and Loosen Up Your Art with Air
items.headline: Loosen Up and Create some Abstract Alcohol Ink Art on Yupo and Tile using a Straw, Canned Air and an Air Brush.
objectives_summary: This course is for all levels of Alcohol Ink painters or crafty/creative folks looking to create!
Learn to work with an Air Brush to create stunning beauties in a very easy and loose way.
This course is about learning to play with colors and freeing up your expectations.

items.title: New Airbrush Painting Techniques
items.headline: How to do spray paint art and speed painting techniques with a cheap airbrush and regular acrylic paints.
objectives_summary: Do spray paint art techniques with a cheap airbrush and water based acrylic paints.
To learn new airbrush techniques adapted from the spray paint artists of Mexico.
Paint a gorgeous wave with your airbrush!

items.title: Learn to Make a Basic Stained Glass Window
items.headline: Learn the basic skills to make a beautiful and unique stained glass window out of lead or copper foil!
objectives_summary: Construct a simple, but unique leaded stained glass panel with the help of a 25 year expert and professional instructor!
AND! I just added two bonus lectures so you can move on to copper foil!!
Get 27 step by step lectures and 2.5 hours of video!

items.title: Beginners Guide to Studio Portrait Photography

visible_instructors.title: Charlie Borland
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Photographer for 30+ years and Lighting Master
visible_instructors.name: Charlie

items.headline: Start your own studio portrait business and learn learn how to light people in a complimentary way.
objectives_summary: Understand the lighting equipment
Understand lighting and how best to apply it to people
Photograph individuals, families, and groups

items.title: Sell Your Art Masterclass

visible_instructors.title: Melanie Greenwood
visible_instructors.job_title: Graphic Designer / Founder of Vision City Art Studio
visible_instructors.name: Melanie

items.headline: Learn how to make a real income by selling your original artwork online to customers all around the world.
objectives_summary: How to sell their artwork online
How to build an effective online art shop
How to market their art to the right people

items.title: Watercolor Painting Course - Pen & Wash Technique Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Rod
visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher

items.headline: Watercolor Painting Course Beginners Pen & Wash Sketchbook & Watercolor Techniques Sketching Ink With Watercolor Washes
objectives_summary: Understand Watercolor Basics Like Values & Color Mixing
Sketch Objects In A Realistic Way
Know How To Use Light & Shadow In Sketches

items.title: Impressionism - Paint this Aspen Autumn scene in oil/acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this Aspen Autumn painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Understand Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings
